class.name: Mesh
class.brief_description: A [Resource] that contains vertex array-based geometry.
class.description: Mesh is a type of [Resource] that contains vertex array-based geometry, divided in [i]surfaces[/i]. Each surface contains a completely separate array and a material used to draw it. Design wise, a mesh with multiple surfaces is preferred to a single surface, because objects created in 3D editing software commonly contain multiple materials.

method.name: create_convex_shape
method.description: Calculate a [ConvexPolygonShape] from the mesh. If [code]clean[/code] is [code]true[/code] (default), duplicate and interior vertices are removed automatically. You can set it to [code]false[/code] to make the process faster if not needed. If [code]simplify[/code] is [code]true[/code], the geometry can be further simplified to reduce the amount of vertices. Disabled by default.

method.name: create_outline
method.description: Calculate an outline mesh at a defined offset (margin) from the original mesh. [b]Note:[/b] This method typically returns the vertices in reverse order (e.g. clockwise to counterclockwise).

method.name: generate_triangle_mesh
method.description: Generate a [TriangleMesh] from the mesh. Considers only surfaces using one of these primitive types: [constant PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLES], [constant PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLE_STRIP], or [constant PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLE_FAN].

method.name: get_aabb
method.description: Returns the smallest [AABB] enclosing this mesh in local space. Not affected by [code]custom_aabb[/code]. See also [method VisualInstance.get_transformed_aabb]. [b]Note:[/b] This is only implemented for [ArrayMesh] and [PrimitiveMesh].

method.name: get_faces
method.description: Returns all the vertices that make up the faces of the mesh. Each three vertices represent one triangle.

method.name: get_surface_count
method.description: Returns the amount of surfaces that the [Mesh] holds.

method.name: surface_get_arrays
method.description: Returns the arrays for the vertices, normals, uvs, etc. that make up the requested surface (see [method ArrayMesh.add_surface_from_arrays]).

method.name: surface_get_blend_shape_arrays
method.description: Returns the blend shape arrays for the requested surface.

method.name: surface_get_material
method.description: Returns a [Material] in a given surface. Surface is rendered using this material.

method.name: surface_set_material
method.description: Sets a [Material] for a given surface. Surface will be rendered using this material.

members.member: Sets a hint to be used for lightmap resolution in [BakedLightmap]. Overrides [member BakedLightmap.default_texels_per_unit].
